title: Contract Clause Simplifier
description: Translate legalese into plain English for clients
prompt:
Explain this legal clause in plain English for a client.

Clause:
[PASTE CLAUSE]

Provide:
1. Simple summary (What it means)
2. Implication (How it affects them)
3. Risk level (Low/Medium/High)
4. An analogy to explain the concept

title: Legal Research Memo Drafter
prompt:
Draft a legal research memo.

Issue: [LEGAL QUESTION]
Jurisdiction: [STATE/COUNTRY]
Key Facts: [LIST FACTS]

Structure:
1. Question Presented
2. Brief Answer
3. Statement of Facts
4. Discussion (Analyze relevant case law and statutes - *Note: Verify all citations manually*)
5. Conclusion

title: Client Intake Interview Script
description: Standardize initial consultations to gather all necessary facts
prompt:
Create a client intake script for a [PRACTICE AREA, e.g., Personal Injury] case.

Goal: Determine if we should take the case.

Sections:
1. Incident Details (Date, time, location)
2. Parties Involved
3. Damages/Injuries
4. Insurance/Coverage
5. Previous Legal History
6. Red Flag Questions (to screen out bad clients)

title: Compliance Checklist Generator
prompt:
Create a compliance checklist for a [INDUSTRY] company in [LOCATION].

Regulation focus: [e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, OSHA]

List:
1. Mandatory Policy Documents
2. Required Employee Training
3. Data Handling Procedures
4. Reporting Requirements
5. Physical Site Requirements
6. Audit Frequency

title: Demand Letter Drafter
description: Write strong demand letters to resolve disputes
prompt:
Write a formal demand letter.

Client: [NAME]
Opposing Party: [NAME]
Dispute: [Unpaid Invoice/Breach of Contract/Property Damage]
Amount Demanded: [AMOUNT]
Deadline: [DATE]

Tone: Firm, professional, authoritative.

Include:
- Factual summary
- Legal basis for claim
- Demand for payment/action
- Consequence of non-compliance (legal action)

title: Deposition Question Bank
description: Prepare for depositions with strategic questions
prompt:
Generate a list of deposition questions for a [WITNESS TYPE] in a [CASE TYPE] case.

Goal: Establish [FACT/ELEMENT].

Categories:
1. Background/Credibility
2. The Incident/Event
3. Damages/Impact
4. Inconsistencies to probe
5. "Clean up" questions

title: Privacy Policy Generator
description: Draft a standard privacy policy for websites/apps
prompt:
Draft a Privacy Policy for a [WEBSITE/APP TYPE].

Data Collected: [Email, Location, Usage Data]
Third-party tools: [Google Analytics, Stripe]
User Rights: [GDPR/CCPA compliance needed]

Sections:
1. Introduction
2. Information We Collect
3. How We Use Your Information
4. Sharing of Information
5. Your Rights
6. Contact Us
